remarks: The norm of a product in a normed ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmmul.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
nmmul.n $e |- N = ( norm ` R ) $.
nmmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
nmmul $p |- ( ( R e. NrmRing /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) x. ( N ` B ) ) ) $.
